mapper.select: select * from ( select row_number() over (order by root, step desc) no, n.* from notice n ) order by no desc;
select * from ( select row_number() over (order by root, step desc) no, n.* from notice n ) where no between #{beginList} and #{endList} order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice (title, content, writer) values (#{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update notice set readcnt = readcnt + 1 where id = #{id}
